owned cards.name: Shrink Ray
owned cards.effects text: When you deal damage, give each Monster damaged a Shrink token. A monster rolls one less die for each Shrink token. A monster can get rid of a Shrink token with a HEALTH instead of using it to heal damage

owned cards.name: Plot Twist
owned cards.effects text: Change one die to any result. Discard when used

owned cards.name: Camouflage
owned cards.effects text: If you take damage, roll a die for each damage point. On a HEALTH, you do not take that damage point.

owned cards.name: Made in a Lab
owned cards.effects text: When purchasing cards you can peek at and purchase the top card of the deck

card shop.name: Burrowing
card shop.effects text: While you are in Tokyo, deal 1 extra damage.When you yield Tokyo, deal 1 damage to the monster taking it

card shop.name: Rapid Healing
card shop.effects text: Spend 2 Energy at any time to heal 1 damage

power card deck.name: Background Dweller
power card deck.effects text: You can always roll any 3s you have

power card deck.name: Frenzy
power card deck.effects text: When you purchase this card take another turn immediately after this one

power card deck.name: Complete Destruction
power card deck.effects text: If you roll 1-2-3-HEAL-ATK-ENERGY gain 9 VP in addition to the regular results

power card deck.name: Energy Hoarder
power card deck.effects text: You gain 1 VP for every 6 energy you have at the end of your turn

power card deck.name: Eater of the Dead
power card deck.effects text: Gain 3 VP every time a Monster's health goes to 0

power card deck.name: Alien Metabolism
power card deck.effects text: Buying cards costs you 1 less energy

power card deck.name: Death From Above
power card deck.effects text: +2 VPs and take control of Tokyo if you don't already control it

power card deck.name: Urbavore
power card deck.effects text: Gain 1 extra VP when beginning the turn in Tokyo.Deal 1 extra damage when dealing any damage from Tokyo

power card deck.name: Acid Attack
power card deck.effects text: Deal 1 extra damage each turn (even when you don't otherwise attack)
